TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug used to treat bacterial infections. It is a type of fluoroquinolone. Also called Avelox.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "clorhidrato de moxifloxacino"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que se usa para tratar infecciones bacterianas. Es un tipo de fluoroquinolona. Tambi√©n se llama Avelox.
